casebody.data:
QUALITY BUILT HOMES INCORPORATED, et al.
v.
TOWN OF CARTHAGE. No. 315PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. James E. Scarbrough, Concord, for Quality Built Homes Incorporated, et al. James R. Demay, Concord, for Quality Built Homes Incorporated, et al. Susan K. Burkhart, Raleigh, for Town of Carthage.

Jennifer Welch.

James M. Carpenter, General Counsel, for N.C. Home Builders Association, Inc. John T. Benjamin, Jr., Raleigh, for Leading Builders of America. William E. Hubbard, Raleigh, for Leading Builders of America. Edward F. Hennessey, IV, Charlotte, for N.C. Home Builders Association, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 14th of December 2015 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 25th day of January 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
